about_the_game:
You were so excited to get the email from the Hiring Manager from Permtech Escape Rooms, the leading developer of escape rooms across the US. They are very selective on who they decide to invite to their team. But nonetheless, you got the email, you got the job, and now all you have to do is impress the boss.

Except the boss is nowhere to be found.

And you are trapped inside.

Somebody seems to be playing a very elaborate prank on you and the other new hires or something has gone terribly, terribly wrong. It is up to you to get out safely and to figure out what is going on inside that building. I hope you're up for the task because one thing is clear, you're going to be here for a long time.

Escape the Office is a single and multiplayer experience where you and your friends will find yourselves trying to get out of several daunting situations. The initial Early Access version of the game will come with 2 levels of varying difficulty and content. The future updates of Escape the Office will give you several escape room situations that are very unlike the others.

You can play with up to four friends in this quasi escape/horror room experience. Can you escape all of the rooms and prove to Permtech that you deserve to be amongst the best?

content_descriptors.notes: This game involves depictions of murder, violence, and fear. Player discretion is advised for younger audiences.

name: Escape The Office

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or 10th Generation Intel Processosrs
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: In this dark, real-life-based horror game, you find yourself trapped on your first day of work at Permtech Escape Rooms. This is either a test or somebody's sick idea of joke. Will you be able to make it out before the timer runs down?
